name: JDO 2 beta
description: The JDO release for public testing
releaseNotes:
Release Notes - JDO - Version JDO 2 beta
Error reading the JDO Meta-Data file "org/apache/jdo/tck/pc/singlefieldidentity/package.jdo". Cause : {1}

issues.title: Logging flags not correctly set for jpox enhancer
all unit tests fail, goal misconfigured
jdorienhance goal need work
build does not create enhanced jar files
enhancement problem w/ maven build w/application identity
TCK test hangs
enhancement occurs unnecessarily with runtck* goals
Fix build to handle Derby Mac bug gracefully
Fix typos in Company package-derby.orm
Enhancement doesn't run when orm file is not up to date
Fix typos in company orm files
Remove PCPoint from schema*.sql
Remove default fields from *.jdo
java.lang.OutOfMemory running TCK with validateTables false
Check in correct defaults for jpox options in jdori.properties
PCRECT table should have two foreign keys to PCPOINT
Add assertions spreadsheet to tck20
Some tests, when they fail, do not close pmf
foreign key attribute to field does not work
Some tests in persistencemanager pkg don't clean up store
PersistenceManagerTest does not clean up Company
TestFieldsOfBigDecimal fails when scale differs
models/fieldtypes tests don't clean the database
HollowInstanceMaintainsPK creates null-valued PCRect
4 tests give java.lang.NullPointerException during tearDown
Four lifecycle tests need schema/metadata
Tests fail attempting to delete from PCPOINT
TestFieldsOfDouble value outside of Derby DOUBLE range
Inconsistency between API doc and spec
Test hangs: AfterCloseGetPMThrowsException
tests hang with org.jpox.autoStartMechanism=None
Tests in the extent package iterate an extent outside a transaction.
Test InstancesPersistedPriorToIterationReturned fails. The new instance is not part of the iteration.
Test MakePersistentAndInstancesNotReachable fails. Instances not reachable at commit need to transition to transient.
Test ExecutingMultipleQueriesSimultaneouslyIsThreadSafe fails because it executes queries outside transactions.
Metadata file for SimpleClass should be in the org/apache/jdo/tck/pc/package.jdo file to guarantee that the metadata is read.
NullPointerException in jdoPreClear
embedded-key and embedded-value should never have different values
Method getKeyAsObject() is missing from SingleFieldIdentity
JPOX PersistenceManagerFactory throws wrong exception for getPersistenceManager after close
API 20 does not implement all JDOHelper methods in the specification.
JDOImplHelper misses new getObjectIdInstance(Class, Object)
No JPOX support for embedded collections of wrapper types
Using datastore identity, JPOX  expects an identity field for an embedded class (ADDRID for Address)
JPOX does not support array of BigDecimal
NullPointerException in TestFieldsOfObject
Foreign key constraint violation with TestArrayListCollections
TestFieldsOfSimpleClass: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: out of field index :88
IndexOutOfBoundsException in HashMap, Hashtable, Map collections tests
QueryResultPassedToAnotherQuery: javax.jdo.JDOFatalInternalException: A query statement cannot be modified after being output
test(org.apache.jdo.tck.query.WhiteSpaceIsACharacterAndIgnored: javax.jdo.JDODataStoreException: Cannot get long result : param = 2
Remove CompletenessTest from alltests.conf
Remove support for GUI test runner
CompletenessTest fails when navigating a self-referencing relationship
JDO API not compatible with JRE 1.3
JPOX throws exception on multiple identical imports
TestArrayCollections: Field "ArrayOfBigDecimal13" in class "ArrayCollections" has been defined with elements that arent embedded. JPOX doesnt support this
org.apache.jdo.tck.query.ComparingCollectionFieldToNull: Cannot perform operation "==" on CollectionExpression and NullLiteral "NULL"
org.apache.jdo.tck.query.NullCollectionsAndContainsMethod: java.lang.NullPointerException
Comparisons between 'INTEGER' and 'CHAR' are not supported. - Derby
Invalid character string format for type INTEGER. - Derby
Value is outside the range for the data type DOUBLE
No authorized routine named 'LIKE' of type 'FUNCTION' having compatible arguments was found.
An attempt was made to put a data value of type 'byte[]' into a data value of type 'BIGINT'.
Cannot set Long parameter: value = null
ERROR 42Y03: 'ASCII' is not recognized as a function or procedure.
Change mapping of char fields
Types of key/value columns and index columns in join tables
Mismatch between ORM metadata and schema
Cannot perform operation "+" on ObjectLiteral "?" = org.apache.jdo.tck.pc.fieldtypes.SimpleClass@cc969a85 and StringLiteral "'%'"
Embedded mapping for fields of SimpleClass not recognized
FieldsOfSimpleInterface has incorrect schema - all fields are LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA
Can't assign class java.lang.String to field org.apache.jdo.tck.pc.fieldtypes.FieldsOfObject.Object94
'ADPT_PK_IDX' is not a column in table or VTI 'APPLICATIONIDENTITY0.COLLECTION_OF_OBJECT1'
Collections fieldtypes need to be remapped
Circular references are not stored properly
Relationship collections have wrong size()
Wrong instance returned for Employee-Insurance relationships
Issues with tck20 test case transaction.GetOptimistic
ERROR 23503: INSERT on table 'COLLECTION_OF_SIMPLE_CLASS3' caused a violation of foreign key constraint
Incorrect value for public Collection CollectionOfDate12
Remove pm.deletePersistent from fieldtypes tests
javax.jdo.spi.I18NHelper causes NullPointerException
SQL Exception: No authorized routine named 'LIKE' of type 'FUNCTION' having compatible arguments was found.
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 >= 0
Collection fieldtypes tests leave cruft in SIMPLE_CLASS table
Attach lifecycle listeners are incorrectly implemented
Detach lifecycle listeners are incorrectly implemented
testRetrieve : has incorrect parameter specification to PM.retrieve() in terms of the fgOnly parameter.
In equality comparisons, use equals() of expected value not persistent object
TestArrayCollections java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: out of field index :28
Embedded type must be persistence capable
metadata/schema typos
TestArrayListCollections ClassCastException
Need attribute on field element for type
Update jdo.dtd for persistent property support
checkValues() method of *MapStringValueCollections doesn't work
The orm.dtd contains #CDATA and extraneous definition of element property
JPOX generates illegal SQL for queries using result class java.util.Map.
TestHashMapStringKeyCollections.test : schema incorrect
Add element-type metadata to ArrayCollections
Fix issues in maven.xml preventing iut goals from running properly
Change setId methods to allow construction of Company Model classes with default constructor
TCK maps BigInteger to BIGINT; should be NUMERIC(31)
TCK doesn't compile with JDK 1.5
Change RunRules to match distribution
build.properties is missing from distribution
Need goal that will compile, enhance, and run one specified test
Add <implements/> to jdo for SimpleClass in pc.fieldtypes
Log memory available in debug mode
CompletetnessTest needed to test mapping metadata
Implement test exclude list
Change return type of makePersistent from void to Object
Missing test run log file
Remove unneeded imports in api20
Need to do full build to get company.xml copied to target dir
Improve documentation on build dependencies
Use JPOX connection pooling to improve performance
Need better information about why two object graphs did not compare equal
PM.newObjectIdInstance javadoc description is inadequate to describe the usage
Provide property to turn off clean-up
Restructure query test packages
Provide expected and actual values when assertion fails in fieldtypes tests
Update DTD for array element-type
Split out alltests.conf into several, smaller configurations
Change wage in PartTimeEmployee instances to a small number
Change group ids for jdo projects from apache-jdo to javax.jdo and org.apache.jdo
Release tck20 as source with a binary dependency on other projects
Change the "test" directory to "src".
Add get/setRollbackOnly tests
Add tests for getUserObject, putUserObject, removeUserObject
Add tests for static JDOHelper.getObjectIds methods
Use jdo20.jar, new jpox build
Build must iterate schema create, run tests, schema drop
New .jdo, .orm, and .sql for pc.company
New .jdo, .orm, and .sql for pc.fieldtypes
New .jdo, .orm, and .sql for pc.inheritance, instancecallbacks
<primary-key> element inclusion
DTD's require catalog, schema attributes
PersistenceManager.retrieve(...) updates to match the JDO2 spec
Upgrade springframework version used in tck20/tck11
Release snapshots of Apache JDO deliverables
